left.title: THE NIGHT THE FORGE WENT SILENT
left.subhead: Power Failure Leaves an Entire District in Darkness.
paragraphs: Late last night, the central forge district abruptly lost all power after an unexplained overload.
Witnesses reported sparks, alarms, and a sudden silence as machines ground to a halt.

left.title: ENGINEERS SCRAMBLE TO CONTAIN DAMAGE
paragraphs: Emergency crews were dispatched within minutes to assess the situation.
Officials claim the damage is contained, though repairs may take several days.

middle.title: OFFICIAL NOTICE: RESTRICTED POWER USAGE
paragraphs: All non-essential machinery is to remain offline until further notice.
Failure to comply may result in sanctions.

middle.title: MERCHANTS FEAR SUPPLY SHORTAGES
paragraphs: Local merchants are already reporting delays in production and transport.
Prices for basic materials are expected to rise if the outage continues.

right.title: BREAKING NEWS: UNKNOWN FIGURE SEEN NEAR FORGE
paragraphs: Several residents claim to have seen a cloaked figure moments before the blackout.
Authorities have neither confirmed nor denied these reports.

items: WORKSHOP GOSSIP: Some say the machines were pushed too hard.
HERMIT SIGHTING: A reclusive engineer was seen entering the city at dawn.
SURVIVAL FAIL: Worker drops rare component into molten slag.
ODDITY: A single lamp remained lit throughout the entire blackout.
